name: Mohr Mickie
text: Such amazing food! Incredibly fresh and very friendly service. Loved our experience with the Turkish Pizza (Boat) made with generous portions of cheese and a meat similar to a thick version Halal pepperoni. Got the mixed grill and loved everything on it! The falafel appetizer was the best falafel we've ever had. Overall very pleased with our dining experience there. Very convenient location in the mall. Will definitely be back!

name: Gunars Cazers
text: A little bit of Berlin right here in Tuscaloosa. I had heard that there was good Middle Eastern wraps somewhere in Tuscaloosa. However, I rarely go into the mall. Today I stopped in and had a döner sandwich.That is basically like a gyros wrap, and the meat is beef and lamb. I opted for the rice instead of fries. It comes with a drink, and I chose a Pepsi, but I lamented that they did not have ayran , the salty yogurt drink. His server said, wait, I will make you one, and he did! It was tasty. The sandwich was large, had plenty of tasty meat on it, and you could choose the toppings, onions, red cabbage, etc. They have a tasty cucumber sauce. The price was not overly high. I really love the rice! I’m not sure what the little brown pieces are that they add, but it was very tasty. Great place to have lunch.

name: daniel lewis
text: The food was delicious and tasty. I really enjoyed my meal in here. Excellent taste and authentic place. Service was great. I would highly recommend this place for real Turkish food. My family and I enjoyed. Service is also excellent. Everything was great, nice and clean.

name: Miro Nad
text: Used to be 5 star but since the original owner (Ozzy or so, big big guy) left so did quality. Used to be our Sunday lunch, every Sunday... so sad

name: Brian Sorrells
text: I got the steak wrap and it was awesome.  Guy at the counter said it’d take 5 minutes but it took 15. But that was minor so no big deal. Highly recommend this place.  I know the pic shows the wrap 3/4 eaten but I forgot and it was so good.

name: eugene barker
text: One of my preferred locations for Turkish food. great location to chill, eat some good food. staff treated us so kindly. the place has an awesome atmosphere.

name: Robert S
text: Another GREAT experience here! The staff are very hard workers and super nice. The food is in large portions and tastes great. I got the Doner sandwich again and it was fantastic as usual. They even gave me a complimentary cup of black tea and a piece of Baklava. If you haven't been here you definitely need to try it out. Great food and great service. I would give it more than 5 stars if I could! I will definitely be back.

name: Rikesh Patel
text:
Great place reminds me of Turkey (country).

Please get a restaurant in downtown probably next to the Jamaican restaurant down there. Really good place!!!

I used to go Yukomoz in downtown and wish these guys would come back there.

name: Steve Yagci
text: It is hard to find Turkish food around AL, and Zee is the best place to have it so far. Very clean, nice staff and fair price. I loved it!

name: Will Sides
text: Excellent food unlike anything else in Tuscaloosa! Everything is fresh and homemade and tastes great. Don't be fooled by the fact that it's in the mall, it's definitely not a typical food court chain. The people working here are very friendly and obviously take pride in their authentic food. Try the baklava and Turkish tea with you meal (only $1 each!)

name: Bryan Reed
text: Hidden gem tucked away in the food court of University Mall.  If you like Mediterranean food then you should make sure to try this restaurant! It really is some of the best food you can get in Tuscaloosa.

name: Heather Feathercliff
text: There are not many good kebab places in Alabama, id there any. But this place is by far the best kebab I have ever ate!

name: Tina Zhang
text: Hands down the best middleterranean food in t-town. The gyro is so delicious and the owner is very friendly. Highly recommended.

name: Tayyaba Khan
text: Great food, great hospitality. Will definitely go back. Nice place to sit too, bonus being inside the mall. Best part: they have halal food.

name: kirin nabi
text: Yummy food and super friendly staff. جزاكم الله خيراً  everything was halal and they worked extra hard to get it all to us in time for iftar.

name: Syed Nabi
text:
Excellent find. Great food and very very friendly staff. Great Turkish food. Will definitely come here again. Discovered it while driving through Tuscaloosa.

all meat is halal.

name: Rick Stevens
text: These guys are awesome! I made a fool of myself and seasoned my fries with sugar instead salt, they laughed with me and gave me new fries (on the house). The food was awesome! I’ll be back soon!

name: Niklas F.
text: Closest I’ve gotten to a real Döner in the US. The meat is the real deal and tastes just like at a Döner place in Germany! Only thing missing to make it perfect is the bread not getting heated/toasted in a sandwich press like most places in Germany do before filling it. 👍

name: Md. Shariful Haque
text: Authentic mediterranean halal food..  Amicable service. Reasonable price. 👍

name: Amar Hasan
text: Great food and customer service as well. All meat they using is Halal certified ( as owner told me). Handmade yogurt drink was delious too. Their bread has unbelievable taste!

name: Raceta Brooks
text: Great Food From My Manz Tony New Restaurant Come Check It Out

name: Nick Bucher
text: Good food, big portions! I went here with my fiancee and we shared the beef and lamb boat, and it was great! The staff were very friendly as well. Highly recommend.

name: Regan Hardy
text: SUCH good food! Delicious, fresh, and giant portions. Great service too. We’ll absolutely be back. 🤩

name: Jazmin B.
text: Amazing service and cuisine! Truly enjoyed, we will be back soon!!

name: Matt “CookaTater” C
text: Honestly, this place has amazing food quality. Considering the price you pay for what you get here, definatly deserves a 5 star rating.

name: Matt Barbour
text: Not a while lot of food options but there main dish was REALLY good and there was a lot of it. $10 well spent! I will definitely be going back again.

name: Terry Stokes
text:
Good choice of steaks. Friendly staff, professional service and a nice low-light ambiance
Off beef kebab and both ground beef I love it

name: Scott Rambo
text: Awesome food and service! Staff was very helpful in determining the best meal for me and were great to speak with after the meal. Definitely will be back!

name: Misty Smith
text: Food and service was wonderful! Huge portions of food for what you pay! Owner of the business was great, let me and my husband sample different foods and sauces. Will definitely be back.

name: steven ypk
text:
One of the best restaurants in Tuscaloosa.
I have tried this restaurant two times, and I was delighted both times. For the first time, I ordered doner plate with rice, and that was tasty. Then the second time, I ordered boat with ground beef, and that was delicious too.
Additionally, the service was perfect.

name: Jamesia Brooks
text: Ohhh my god I love it food is very fresh delicious

name: Devon Mack
text: Very good tasting food but portions are small

name: Mustafa Pehlivan
text: There was excellent service personnels. Also meals were very delicious. I definitely recommend that everyone should try special plate. It was awesome.

name: Anil Cercer
text:
Well, I had some hesitation before I went to this new place at the mall because I did NOT thing it would anything close to authentic Turkish food...BUT i was wrong!! The food was great and the staff was extremely friendly! After I had lunch they treated me with baklava and turkish tea(YOU HAVE GOT TO TRY)!
I tried “Lamb Doner with Rice” my first time and I loved every single bite. The second time I tried their new shish kebab which was also delicious and the portions were BIG! Anyways, you should try their food and I am sure you will agree with me!

name: Lamazie Jackson
text: This place was awesome. New tastes I have learned and it was great!!!

name: Philip Love
text:
This place is worth a visit. Good food, in dish sizes that will more than likely fill you up, and a friendly laid-back environment.

I ordered a bowl of rice as a side and a chicken gyro as the main dish. Both tasted great. The gyro itself you get to handpick what you like and if you dont know, they are more than happy to help you.

They have a lot more dishes to try from if you dont want what I had. They offer salads, and a few meats, along with a dish I can't remember the name of that they offered to let us try. It was just as great as the gyro. I will be going back.

name: Dilek Özen
text: Delicious foods and pleasant atmosphere!

name: Daizia Womack
text: Amazing food very friendly staff

name: John Paul Whitmore
text: Amazing food, huge portions, and cheap. Will definitely be going back.

name: JAJA MONAE
text: I my god it this place in perfect Tuscaloosa food very delicious  I love it 😘😘😘😍😍🤪🤪🤪😋😋😋😋

name: Zykeil Causey
text: Oh my God food very very delicious 😋 I love ❤️ Come back again I love it 🥰 😋😋😋😋😋😋🥰🥰🥰🥰🤩🤩🤩🤩😚😚😚😚😘😘😘

name: Hamad Alkhaldi
text: Delicious food. Everyone should try the chicken Doner. And the owner is very friendly. Definitely going to visit it again.

name: Robbie Bland
text: Soooo gooood. Get the Doner sandwich. Turkish cuisine.

name: Jordan Herring
text: Wanted to try something different and I’m glad I did! The food was fantastic and the staff was friendly!

name: kenny b
text: Everything is fresh you can see them making breads. The beef and lamb were flavorful, and the staff provided excellent service!

name: Quaveon Gilmore
text: I love it food here very good delicious

name: Shamil Ramazanov
text: Very delicious food, 10 out of 10 service. Will definitely come back!

name: Serhat Günaydın
text: This is the most beautiful local cuisine I have ever tried. My favorite one is special wrap!!!

name: Hamza Yolcu
text: Everything was perfect. You should definitely go there and eat something :)

name: Markece Ryans
text: Oh my God food is perfect .I am going every week

name: Liam Cypel
text: Ozzy's is authentic and delicious. One of the freshest and best restaurants in Tuscaloosa, where the only thing more amazing than the food are the employees and owner.

name: Mehdi Mahmoodi
text: Great food and service. Kind staff ...

name: Happy Lady
text: Assalomu aleykum, long time I was looking like this kind of place where I can go to eat HALAL meat and clean and delicious food😋. Excellent customer service👍👍👍 I come every weekend to have a dinner with my family. I highly recommend this place. Oh, my favorite one is "sandwich" (lamb and beef) so yummy 😃 but my kids prefer "doner" (lamb and beef)😉 thanks for your hard working nice people 🙏 God bless you.

name: sameckia freeman
text: Best food best place not just Tuscaloosa from America 😍😍😍😍😍

name: Bria Hinton
text: I love this food very good very delicious

name: Cihan Kaya
text: I just learned today that there is a turkish restaurant in tuscaloosa. I went there one of my german friend. The food is very tasty and fresh salad and bread . The employees are friendly and very kind. After dinner, they offered tea and baklava for free. I higly recommend this restaurant.

name: Nicole Tyler
text: I was happy to learn about this Restaurant. Both my husband and I got the Doner on a bun and it's very good.

name: Babak Ahmadov
text: Everything is very very delicious. If you want eat high quality of doner, kabab  i reccomend you this place. Perfect meet, perfect staff. Thanks Zee’s doner and kebab

name: Sami Alshammari
text: You should give it a try, delicious Doners and beef wraps and I'm going to try the other dishes

name: Jason Hayes
text: Tried it today for the first time, the food was delicious.

name: Al Kandrii99
text: The food was really amazing and the service amazing.

name: Latoya Jackson
text: The best!! Come enjoy the best in town

name: Robbie Thomas

text: Food ver delicious 😋

text: I love it all food is fresh

name: Jigga Gardner
text: Soo good soo good

name: Remi Golebiowski
text: Great food!.. Great guys!..enough said!

name: Abdulrahman Alajmi
text: The falafel is very good and the boat chicken

name: Yousef Almuwaizeri

text: Best food beef chicken kebabs in Tuscaloosa  thanks 🙏

name: Amber Mitchell
text: This restaurant really good , especially diner wrap.

Fantastic Kebab wraps. They’re huge!
Will come back.

name: Eyüp Akin Özdeniz
text:
(Translated by Google) Tastes very good - much better than some Turkish restaurants or kebab shops in Germany 🥙🥙🥙🥙🥙🥙

Delicious Turkish Kebabs and other menus 🥙🥙🥙🥙🥙🥙🥙🥙

name: jose javier
text:
(Translated by Google) Delisioso

(Original)
Delisioso

name: Jose Ruiz
text: Reminds me of döner kebab street food I would enjoy in France. Definitely recommend if you want to try something new and exciting!

name: Kristina _55
text: Döner is one of the dishes we miss the most from Europe and when we found this place in auburn we were beyond excited. The food was great and the wait time was quick. The owner took all measures to keep the costumers safe during COVID.

name: Tanner Pittman
text: Absolutely great. I have never had a better doner kebab. This place is an undiscovered gem in downtown Auburn.

name: Jacob Badolato
text: This place was great. The lady who runs it is very kind and was helpful in deciding what to get. Food was authentic and the baklava was great as well. The place was empty when we went and my 13 guest party was able to order and get all of our food in 20 or 30 minutes. We were very happy and well fed as their portions were not small.

name: Debra Hromalik
text: Wow, we had an amazing Dinner with friends at this restaurant. Everything was cooked fresh after our order.  The baklava dessert is made fresh daily. It was the best I have ever tasted! Looking forward to enjoying this restaurant as often as possible.

name: aria b
text: the staff is so unbelievably sweet ! they are always so helpful and the food is absolutely to die for. i cant believe the place isnt busier people really need to start going here

name: Nawaf ASD
text: This place is amazing and the food is the best in Auburn. The employees are the best. The lady work there she’s awesome.

name: Adam Furman
text: The beef was a quite fatty so I recommend the chicken, but still very good.

name: Elahe Boskabadi
text: We ordered royal doner plate and adana kebob. Doner was cold and like ready meal not doner and Adana kebob was more like burgers. Not recommended

name: Travis Baker
text: Nice little place. Good food.

name: David Hedrick
text: The meat was ok on the doners, won't fault them there. Will fault them for not answering their phone after I called trying to talk to them. I ordered delivery for two sandwiches and three wing orders. The wings, I wanted a spicy, a mild, a honey bbq. What I got instead were three orders of lemon pepper wings. Also, I don't know if they even have a physical location, because we went to where google maps says their address is and we ended up in the parkind deck for the Hound and Little Italy and were pointed to a spot between Arigato and Tacorita- pro-tip, there is no spot there, at least not around back. Grubhub gave us our money back for the wings, never could reach Royal Doner. We tried a few times to call and tell them how the wings were wrong but whatever.

name: Sonya Fowler
text: Just finished eating my gyro wrap kebab. So good, literally delicious! On top of that my phone was dead and I needed a cab home. Q was such a gentleman, he tried to find a charger for my phone then helped me call a taxi. I truly appreciate all the service I received here. I made it home safe with yummy food too. Thanks so much.

name: Dr. Deb Kern
text: DELICIOUS and also super healthy! The owners are so friendly- and the food is made fresh daily. I’m just visiting Auburn for a swim meet, but if I lived here I’d eat at Royal Doner as often as possible.

name: alice brown
text: I went with my boyfriend and it was absolutely amazing! The food was delicious, the staff was nice, and just the overall ambiance was incredible. I will definitely be going again!

name: Gandhi Balasubramaniam
text: This place is hard to locate on the map, your gps will not take you anywhere near the front door. Just park somewhere, get on foot to N College St and pay close attention to signs. You will find it; if not, just call the number. Despite that, food was fantastic. Lady gave us free tea and baklawa and it was delicious. She makes everything by hand. I will visit again when I am in town. Cheers.

name: Kim Golden
text: Wonderful service, DELICIOUS food. I would compare this to Greek but I prefer it. The sauce is so good, and the vegetables are fresh. You can't beat the beef. Reasonably priced and good portion sizes.

name: Charles Stephen
text: Great food! So happy to have a Turkish place in Auburn.

name: Nawaf ASD
text: This place is amazing and the food is the best in Auburn. The employees are the best. The lady work there she’s awesome.

name: Kim Golden
text: Wonderful service, DELICIOUS food. I would compare this to Greek but I prefer it. The sauce is so good, and the vegetables are fresh. You can't beat the beef. Reasonably priced and good portion sizes.

name: Gandhi Balasubramaniam
text: This place is hard to locate on the map, your gps will not take you anywhere near the front door. Just park somewhere, get on foot to N College St and pay close attention to signs. You will find it; if not, just call the number. Despite that, food was fantastic. Lady gave us free tea and baklawa and it was delicious. She makes everything by hand. I will visit again when I am in town. Cheers.

name: Kaci DeBord
text: Amazing owner, INCREDIBLE STAFF and the most fantastic food!! I highly recommend!! Could not have asked for a better experience. I live 3 hours away but I will be back!! GO DAWGS!

name: abbey bradley
text: The food is amazing and the service was very friendly and helpful! Anyone that has ever tried Döner and misses it should definitely check this place out! They made me remember my time in Germany.

name: Warren Smith
text: Royal Doner sandwich has delicious roast lamb on middle East bread with yogurt and herb sauce! A real mealful amount of tasty meat.

name: Jesse Garcia
text: Food was mediocre. Bread was really dry.

name: Von Donteen
text: Went there with family. I’m very impressed. Great service. Will come again!

name: Brent Willis
text: Shawarmas in this place are delightful!!! The dessert they made me try I don’t remember the name but it was worth it experiencing. Give it a try.

name: Robert Robbins
text: Casey was extremely knowledgable and helpful! Plus the food was excellent. It had the local and unique feel to the restaurant which isn't often found in downtown Auburn! Strongly recommend!

name: J Walters
text: So the guy there, super chill and really helpful. The meat was so wonderfully seasoned and that baklava? Best I've had since my mom made it last. Flakey, sweet and not feel premade. Oh and the Turkish coffee is phenomenal. Highly recommend.

name: Brenda Muller
text: Great place. Had the Royal Doner Kebab and baklava - the gyro meat in the Royal Doner Kebab was cooked perfectly.

name: Rachel Pickens
text: Food was delicious and the people were very friendly. Definitely give this place a try!

name: Katie Jones
text: I was pretty psyched to see one of these in the US. Food was decent and service was pretty slow. Definitely not the European original, but a fair enough version for a college town.

name: Matthew Correia
text:
Been here twice now, extremely good food. Great, friendly service.

One of my favorite resturants in Auburn now. I would describe the Doner as kind of like a Gyro or a burrito, with beef, tzatziki sauce, sauce, and more. It's very tasty.

name: Art Gonzales
text: Great fresh food served on real plates. Also bread baked in house!!

name: Danielle Hayes
text: They have really tender rotisserie chicken and awesome accompaniments to create your own salad (an off the menu option I have enjoyed many times). Also very hospitable employees who welcome you to sit an enjoy their specialty hot tea while you wait.

name: Mark Barber
text: Yes! A Turkish place in auburn! Legit. Very fresh. Very clean place. Real Turkish coffee too!! Definitely give this place a try! The beef is sooo tender.

name: Miles Copeland
text: Food is quality and great service. Baklava is really good.

name: Mete Kamil
text: The Doner is awesome! 100% recommend!

name: Natália Perígolo
text: Delicious food and friendly staff 👍

name: musa eşit
text: Excellent service, the best quality food and location.

name: Garrett Golden
text: I've never felt more welcomed! Every time my family has gone the food has been delicious and we're treated like family.

resp.text: Thank you. You welcome any time.

name: Aravind Reddy
text: Not worth it. The food was okay but they didn't even warm it up before serving.

name: Yvonne Dorff
text: Not like home! Döner was no Döner and the Börek was no Börek. But the people were friendly and we got Baklava for free because the flatbread was out. (Baklava was good) But still quite disappointing.. we won’t be back...

name: Toast McGoats
text: The food is really fresh! This was my first visit but I'll be back!

name: Asim Ali
text: The kovurma is my favorite. Delicious food, friendly staff, and good location.

name: Ginger Stern
text: Very good and very fresh. I'll be back

name: Russell Miller
text: Great new Turkish restaurant.

name: Ayman Ahmed
text: They gave me a free t shirt

name: Ibrahim Gurgil
text: New favorite

name: Ege KORKMAZ
text:
(Translated by Google) Uncle, I really like your hands, is it good in Alabama? Restaurant, meals number ten

(Original)
Dayı valla ellerine sağlık çok beğendim, Alabama’da işler iyi mi ? Restoran, yemekler on numara

name: Nn İnn
text:
(Translated by Google) This was my worst experience of turkish food. Lahmacun was not a lahmacun, rice was cold and chicken was not even cooked.

Only unfortunately the name of the Turkish food is very bad maybe the cookers do not know because the turk.

(Original)
This was my worst experience of turkish food. Lahmacun was not a lahmacun, rice was cold and chicken was not even cooked.

Sadece ismi turkce yemekler maalesef cok kotuydu belkide pisirenler turk olmadigi icin bilmiyorlar.

name: rapid eagle
text:
(Translated by Google) Hala according to the seller.
Meat a little dry, no bread served with a full plate.
Arguable and quality service.

(Original)
Hala selon le vendeur.
Viande un peu seche, pas de pain servi avec une assiette complète.
Service argéable et de qualité.
